title: "Artificial intelligence helps predict performance of sugarcane in the field"
excerpt: "A Brazilian study published in Scientific Reports shows that artificial intelligence (AI) can be used to create efficient models for genomic selection of sugarcane and forage grass varieties and predict their performance in the field on the basis of their DNA."
